title: Does This Photo Show Joe Biden with the ‘Grand Wizard of the KKK’?
subtitle: In the aftermath of the first round of Democratic primary debates, social media users shared a largely misleading, inaccurate meme that targeted the former vice president.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: A photograph shared on social media in June 2019 showed former Vice President Joe Biden with the Grand Wizard of the Ku Klux Klan.
